item.title: Intigriti January Challenge by Godson - XSS Writeup
item.description:
Intigriti January XSS Challenge Writeup

Introduction

This month’s Intigriti challenge presented us with a classic XSS objective - popping an alert box! Let’s dive into how we approached and analyzed this challenge.
